Package com.itsradiix.discordwebhook.utils

Class Utils

java.lang.Object
com.itsradiix.discordwebhook.utils.Utils
public abstract class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
The Utils class contains important methods that we use across our project. Currently the class is small enough to contain all these Methods. If the class gets to large and becomes unreadable we will split the class into multiple different Utility classes. This class should not be initialized, thus it is abstract.

    • Utils

      public Utils()

  • Method Details

    • hexToDecimal

      public static int hexToDecimal​(java.lang.String hex)
      This static method will translate Hex color codes to Decimal color codes as that's Discords standard. You can use various tools to get a Hex color, like: https://htmlcolorcodes.com/
      Parameters:
      hex - Set the border color of your Embedded Message. This must be a Hex color code.
      Returns:

    • serializeObject

      public static java.lang.String serializeObject​(java.lang.Object object)
      This static Method serializes an object to a JSON String using the GSON package.
      Parameters:
      object - Object to be serialized
      Returns:
      String returns the serialized Object as JSON String

    • parseUnicode

      private static java.lang.String parseUnicode​(java.lang.String s)
      This Method parses Unicode, this is not the ideal method but due to Java's String Class we have no other choice. Java's String class automatically encodes Unicode, which will make the Discord Server respond with an 400 HTML error code.
      Parameters:
      s - String to be parsed.
      Returns:
      String with UniCodes set.

    • postToAPI

      public static java.lang.String postToAPI​(java.lang.String route, java.lang.String json)
      The postToAPI method can be used to post data to the API.
      Parameters:
      route - This is the used route to get data from the API.
      json - This is the JSON Object as string that will be posted to the API
      Returns:
      Returns the response the API gave.

    • getResponse

      private static void getResponse​(javax.net.ssl.HttpsURLConnection con, java.lang.StringBuilder response)
      This Method is used internally to get the response code from the Discord Server
      Parameters:
      con - This represents an HttpsURLConnection
      response - This is the response from the Discord Server.
